text:
EDEKA Bringmeister | Software Engineer - Backend | Berlin | FULL-TIME INTERNS ONSITE https://www.bringmeister.de

Bringmeister is EDEKAs grocery delivery service - we are delivering groceries to your door step in Berlin and Munich. For our development team in Berlin we are looking for a:

* Software Engineer - Backend (Java, Spring Boot, Kafka / Kinesis, Camunda)

You will work on our new shop platform that is accessed by our React (Native) Frontend. We run our services in Docker containers on AWS, so some experience with AWS & Docker is a plus.

All levels, internships or working students positions are available as well. Basic german skills (and/or willingness to learn) are a must. Interview process works like this: first step onsite interview with our developers, second step is a small homework. Final step is a short interview with HR to talk about contract stuff. Contact me: nicholas.wittstruck@edeka.de
